snippet: Nearly three dozen companies and individuals were accused of evading the economic measures — an indication that the United States was not relaxing its pressure despite a temporary nuclear agreement.
abstract: Obama administration penalizes nearly three dozen companies and individuals in eight countries, accusing them of evading Iranian economic sanctions; move is indication that United States is not relaxing its pressure despite temporary nuclear agreement.
lead_paragraph: Nearly three dozen companies and individuals were accused of evading the economic measures — an indication that the United States was not relaxing its pressure despite a temporary nuclear agreement.

headline.main: U.S. Issues Penalties Over Violations of Iran Sanctions
headline.print_headline: U.S. Issues Penalties Over Violations of Iran Sanctions
